name: t0kenrent
description: T0kenRent - Decentralized Rental Tokenization and Escrow Platform built on BSV blockchain with HTTP 402 payment gating

scripts.cicada:write-config: docker cp Config/babbage-portal.json cicada:/app/config/ || true && docker cp Config/babbage-identity.json cicada:/app/config/ || true
scripts.cicada:restart: docker restart cicada || docker compose restart cicada || echo 'no cicada container'
scripts.cicada: npm run cicada:write-config && npm run cicada:restart
